title: Measles Outbreak Linked To Disneyland Hits Over 70 Cases
teaser: A measles outbreak linked to Disneyland in California has now infected over 70 people, many unvaccinated. NPR's Arun Rath talks with science writer Seth Mnookin, author of The Panic Virus.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
